headline.main: ALLIED AIRMEN BOMB FACILITIES IN BURMA; Communications, Airfields and Supply Lines Pounded

lead_paragraph: NEW DELHI, India, May 2 (AP) -- American and British airmen attacked Japanese positions at many points in Burma yesterday, bombing and strafing troops, airfields and supply lines in widespread operations that lasted on into the night. Allied communiques disclosed today.
abstract: US planes raid Pagoda Pt, Mandalay, Hopin, Kwitu, Shaduzup, Kamaing, Lalawng-Ga and Myitnge bridge; RAF raids Taungup, Moulmein and Akyab
